snippet: New categories in the New York Dance and Performance Awards, or Bessies, shift the focus to definitions instead of to what is onstage.
abstract: New York Dance and Performance Awards, otherwise known as the Bessies, have strict guidelines defining what qualifies as dance, thereby excluding many noteworthy performances.
lead_paragraph: New categories in the New York Dance and Performance Awards, or Bessies, shift the focus to definitions instead of to what is onstage.

headline.seo: Bessies’ New Categories Limit Definitions of Dance
headline.main: Classifications in the Science of an Art
headline.print_headline: Classifications In the Science Of an Art

keywords.value: New York Dance and Performance Awards (Bessies)
